data string after padding: no error~

011001010111001001110010

01001100111001110111100100000
11001101010101101001001110010
00001101111101101001001111110

010110000000111111000011101111101011000111111100011100100111100000011111011001001011000

data bits after appending CRC checksum (sent frame):
01011000000011111100001110111110101100011111110001110010011110000001111101100100101100011

received frame:
01011000000011111100001110111110101100011111110001110010011110000001111101100100101100011

result of CRC checksum matching: no error detected

data block after removing CRC checksum bits:
01001100111001110111100100000

00001101111101101001001111110

data block after removing check bits:
011011100110111100100000
